text: As Young as You Feel is a 1951 American comedy movie directed by Harmon Jones and starring Thelma Ritter, Monty Woolley, David Wayne, Jean Peters, Marilyn Monroe, Russ Tamblyn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was remade in 1957 as The Greatest American Hoax. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:Movies directed by Harmon Jones
title: As Young as You Feel
